abstract: TPS Eastern Africa, the Kenyan holding company of the Serena Hotel chain, said it got bids for 59 percent of the shares on sale in the first day of its rights offer.
snippet: TPS Eastern Africa, the Kenyan holding company of the Serena Hotel chain, said it got bids for 59 percent of the shares on sale in the first day of its rights offer.
lead_paragraph: TPS Eastern Africa, the Kenyan holding company of the Serena Hotel chain, said it got bids for 59 percent of the shares on sale in the first day of its rights offer, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: Kenyan Holding Company Has Strong Debut

abstract: DealBook has more information on the 10 banks that have agreed to loan General Motors $5 billion as an additional financial cushion for its initial public offering.
snippet: DealBook has more information on the 10 banks that have agreed to loan General Motors $5 billion as an additional financial cushion for its initial public offering.
lead_paragraph: As General Motors continues in its march toward an initial public offering, perhaps filing for one as soon as Friday, the automaker has taken big steps to bolster its financial health as much as possible.

headline.main: The Banks Behind G.M.’s $5 Billion Loan

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
